name: Dreams of Elliot
description:
Um jogo de impacto social com objetivo de criticar o trabalho infantil e incentivar as doações a Unicef | A social impact game with the main goal of criticizing children exploration and growing the amount of donations to Unicef.

TEAM:

1- Caio Filizola - Game Designer & Manager

2-Eduardo Amorim - 3D Modeler

3-Leonardo Moura - 3D Modeler

4- Gabriel Matos - 3D Modeler

5-Marcelino Borges - Programmer

Feito em 48h para a Game Jam + | Made in 48h to the Game Jam +

Minimum Requirements:

Intel Core i5

Video card 2GB 128bits

500MB hard disk
